WorkItem.Description:
I am running XP-Pro, and with the two most recent "updates"  (2.2.28 and 2.3.0) Rawr simply won't start. The  pre-start "icon screen" opens, then I just get the microsoft pop-up window saying:
"Rawr has encountered a problem and needs to close. We are sorry for the inconvenience."
 
No error code or anything.
 
No other applications were running at the time.
WorkItem.Summary: [Launch] Rawr 2.2.28 and now 2.3.0 will not start/run

Comments.Message:
What Service Pack and version of .NET are you running?
Where are you running Rawr from?

->c:\WINDOWS\Microsoft.NET\Framework\v2.0.50727

< Installed .NET Frameworks >
.NET FW 1.1 SP 1
.NET FW 2.0 SP 2
.NET FW 3.0
.NET FW 3.5 SP 1

I am running rAWR from a shortcut on my desktop, with all the extracted files in a folder in my Program Files Directory.

Prior to my upgrading it was working fine. (I believe it was 2.2.27)
Rawr does not work from Program Files. Place it somewhere you have full access.
